Posts.Content: Hi I had mastectomy and immediate reconstruction on 23rd Jan.  This was my first surgery too (I’m 42) and I was absolutely petrified. I was worried I wouldn’t wake up or the surgery wouldn’t work. It was all fine. I don’t remember going to sleep as I think they gave me something to relax first.  It will all be fine, this is something they do everyday. Good luck xx
Posts.Title: New and scared!
